ModMetaData.name: Fantastic Flora(continued)
ModMetaData.author: Redrus Fijorn
ModMetaData.description:
Fantastic Flora is a project aimed at making your bases have more floral variety.
New this Update: Starlet Trees! Swisshrooms! Cocopalmegranate Trees! Squerry Trees! Hapisgradzuli Plant! Liquoriceroot Fungus! Zelenistool Mushroom!
Below is a list of what this mod adds:
New Flowers:
Bronzeleaf Coneyums 2 variations Eloverna Gammalions Hapisgradzuli Hyfflesia 3 variations Mern Moonlily Oylicia 2 variations Potaris Yllarius 2 variations
New Shrubbery: Fauxberry Popzee 3 variations Troupis Yllarius 2 variations
New Cave Plants: Liquoriceroot Zelenistool
New Trees: Azulcaps Bleak Broach Cocopalmegranate Greenwood Mangrove Muhly 3 variations Mooshtree Nirigi 6 variations Squerry Starlet Swisshroom Truffula 5 variations
New Fruit: Bleakberries Squerries Cocopalmegranates Swisscaps
New Cave Produce: Liquoriceroot Zelenicaps (Meat Substitute)
New Ingredients: Mooshum Milk
